GSD.product_version: versions from v4.3 to before v5.4.176
GSD.description:
drm/msm/dsi: invalid parameter check in msm_dsi_phy_enable

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.176 by commit 581317b1f001b7509041544d7019b75571daa100, it was introduced in version v4.3 by commit 5c8290284402bf7d2c12269402b3177b899c78b7. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: drm/msm/dsi: invalid parameter check in msm_dsi_phy_enable
